name: MP Pension
overview: MP Pension is a privately owned investment manager. The firm provides its services to its members. It manages pension funds for its clients. The firm invests in the public equity, fixed income, and alternative investments markets across the globe. It primarily makes its alternative investments in private equity. The firm employs a combination of various investment strategies to make its investments. It typically invests in companies practicing good corporate governance and environmental and social responsibility. The firm does not invest in companies operating in nuclear weapons systems manufacturing industries, companies that face allegations of involvement in the manufacturing of anti-personnel landmines and cluster bombs, or companies that face allegations of directly violating the ILOâ€™s conventions on forced labor, child labor, discrimination and freedom of organization. MP Pension was founded in 1960 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
